title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.13 - Commercial activity; posting of signs; solicitation of funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.13 - Commercial activity; posting of signs; solicitation of funds

State Regulations

No person shall, without the written permission of the
authority, on any part of the authority facilities: (a) carry on any commercial
activity; (b) post, distribute or
display signs, advertisements, circulars, printed or written matter; or
(c) solicit funds for any
purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
